name: LifeHacks
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Hacks for life! Life hacks are fun tips that make your life run a little bit more smoothly. When you add them to your flash briefing, your day will start with a nice little tip, every day!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
